/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the bustling city below.
